name: 保罗‧贝兰托尼
name_full: 保罗‧贝兰托尼 Paul Bellantoni
introduction: Paul Bellantoni is an actor/singer known primarily for his voiceover work. Paul makes his animated feature debut with Ruben Brandt, Collector. He works mainly on video games, documentaries, commercials, and as a narrator of audio books. His singing voice has been heard as the Cowardly Lion ornament from Hallmark, a singing Ogre for Blizzard's Hearthstone franchise, and an animated rapping superhero dentist bunny, for Colgate. Trained as a stage actor, Paul has extensive theatre credits in New York City, ranging from contemporary roles, to Off-Broadway musicals, to the title role in Macbeth. Raised in Concord, MA, forged in New York City, crafted in Europe, he now lives in Los Angeles. He was an opera singer from 1992-2005 singing leading bass-baritone roles across the U.S. and in Europe.
